name: Waterkledde
movement: 40 ft. walking, flying, and swimming speed
description: The Waterkledde is a large, chaotic evil fiend that embodies the destructive forces of nature, characterized by its formidable presence and impressive mobility in various terrains.
memorable: It has the unique ability to emit a terrifying scream that instills fear and causes psychic damage.
goals: Typically seeks to create fear and chaos among its foes and dominate aquatic environments.
relations: Often encountered alongside other fiends or chaotic creatures, not commonly seen allied with lawful or good beings.
environment: Usually found in water-based ecosystems, such as lakes or rivers.
strengths: High mobility with swimming, flying, and walking speeds; ability to manipulate fear and grapple opponents.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage commonly associated with good-aligned creatures.
attacks: Multiattack consisting of a powerful Bite and two slashing Claw attacks, with grappling capabilities to restrain its prey.
most_powerful_ability: Frightening Call, which can terrify and damage multiple targets in a wide area.
skills: Has basic perception skills, with a passive perception score of 11 indicating moderate awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to 15 minutes, allowing it to stay submerged.
Able to magically change shape into smaller beasts.
Eyes remain an unnatural green regardless of its form.
Resistant to cold and non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Impressive Constitution score enhancing its hit points and survivability.
test_queries: fiend that can swim and fly
large chaotic evil creature in water
swift aquatic fiend with unique abilities
